title: John Oliver | Trump Undercuts His National Emergency Declaration: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump declaring a national emergency and spending a weekend lashing out at critics.

Then, Seth talks to John Oliver talks about unplugging from the news cycle, deep diving into the absurd details surrounding Brexit and the 2020 U.S. presidential election. He also sticks around for a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
